activities.title: Arrival and Check-in
activities.description: Arrive in Paris and check-in to a comfortable mid-range hotel.

activities.title: Visit Louvre Museum
activities.description: Explore the world-renowned Louvre Museum and discover its art collections.

activities.title: Dinner at Le Bouillon Chartier
activities.description: Enjoy a delicious French meal at this historic restaurant known for its traditional dishes.

activities.title: Explore Montmartre
activities.description: Wander through the charming streets of Montmartre, visit Sacré-Cœur Basilica, and enjoy panoramic views of Paris.

activities.title: Lunch at Le Relais Gascon
activities.description: Savor a delicious French meal at this cozy restaurant known for its traditional cuisine.

activities.title: Seine River Cruise
activities.description: Relax on a scenic Seine River cruise and admire the iconic landmarks of Paris illuminated at night.

activities.title: Visit Musée d'Orsay
activities.description: Explore the impressive collection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masterpieces at Musée d'Orsay.
activities.location: 1 Rue de la Légion d'Honneur, 75007 Paris

activities.title: Lunch at Le Procope
activities.description: Dine at the oldest café in Paris, known for its historic ambiance and French cuisine.

activities.title: Stroll along Champs-Élysées
activities.description: Walk down the famous avenue, shop at luxury boutiques, and enjoy the vibrant atmosphere.

activities.title: Visit Notre-Dame Cathedral
activities.description: Admire the stunning Gothic architecture of Notre-Dame Cathedral on Île de la Cité.
activities.location: 6 Parvis Notre-Dame - Pl. Jean-Paul II, 75004 Paris

activities.title: Lunch at Café de Flore
activities.description: Experience a classic Parisian café culture at this historic café frequented by famous intellectuals.

activities.title: Farewell Dinner at Le Comptoir du Relais
activities.description: Enjoy a memorable dinner at this popular bistro known for its exceptional French cuisine.
